name: Crux
long_description:
Crux is a Decision-Making AI Copilot. Fast-growing teams use Crux to get highly contextual insights and recommendations in minutes, simply by talking to their data in natural language.
One of our power users are performance marketing teams who create media plans, optimise ads, and report performance to clients with Crux's Copilot at lightning-fast speed so they can focus on strategic & creative problems.
one_liner: Embedded AI Copilots on Structured Data
